name: Rodents: Rewind
description:
(Open in Google Chrome if not working in Safari)

PEGI 16/Blood/Violence Strong Language/Suggestive Themes/Use of Alcohol

Rodents: Rewind is a 2D action-adventure game set in the city Kotzeon, 50 years from now. The residents are classified into several classes, and the Southwest suburb is where the lowest class, the 'Rodents' reside. 

Waking up on the street remembering nothing at all, you'll start your adventure as Onyx in this mysterious district while working with AmberCrow, a local gang led by a young lady called Richa. Along the way, you'll meet old friends and new rivals, and maybe one day, find your memory back. 

"What exactly is 'Rodents'? "

"What happened to me? "

"Who am I? "

It's time to find out.

Controls: 

WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement; Press again to run/double jump

Left Click/X: Attack

Right Click/Shift: Dash

Q: Skills

E: Interact

Esc: Menu/Save and Exit

Estimated play time: 20min (saves enabled)

Press Kit:
